allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial scaffold: NestJS backend, Next.js frontend, Prisma schema

- Monorepo structure with apps/backend, apps/frontend, packages/types
- Core entities: Organization, User, Session with multi-tenancy support
- Docker Compose for PostgreSQL, Redis, Elasticsearch, Mailhog
- Health check endpoint, seed data, landing page
- PRDs and specifications for all platform modules

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
